name: Lal Bhoplyacha Bharit (Red Pumpkin Raita) Recipe
ingredients: 200 Gram Red Pumpkin1 cup Thick Yogurt1-2 Green Chillies1/2 tsp Mustard SeedsPinch of Asafoetida5-6 Curry Leaves1/2 tsp Desi Ghee1/2 tsp Sugar1 tbsp Roasted GroundnutsSalt to Taste
procedure: 1.Chop the pumpkin into cubes and let them boil. Once soft, let the pieces cool and mash them well.2.Take a bowl of yoghurt and beat it well. Mix the mashed pumpkin. Add finely chopped green salt and sugar. Mix well.3.Preparing the tempering by heating ghee in a tadka pan and adding mustard seeds, curry leaves and asafoetida. Pour the tempering on the raita and mix again. Serve chilled.

name: Lal Bhoplyacha Bharit (Red Pumpkin Raita) Recipe
procedure: Chop the pumpkin into cubes and let them boil. Once soft, let the pieces cool and mash them well.
Take a bowl of yoghurt and beat it well. Mix the mashed pumpkin. Add finely chopped green salt and sugar. Mix well.
Preparing the tempering by heating ghee in a tadka pan and adding mustard seeds, curry leaves and asafoetida. Pour the tempering on the raita and mix again. Serve chilled.
